title: Bi, The Urban Bike
body:
Conception of an electric foldable bicycle that can easily fit into a trunk and is easy to charge. This bike is designed for small trips into the city, eliminating the need to take the car inside urban areas.

*2013*



[lp=Bi Poster.jpg]


[lp=Bi Closed.jpg]

[lp=Bi Pliage.jpg]


The ingenious folding mechanism provides a quick and elegant transition into a very compact shape. The folding happens in two different axes. The back wheel rotates upward and the front wheel rotates laterally to fit in the center of the frame.

title: Tisch der Geduld
summary: Developing a concept around the theme Tempus fugit (time flies)
body:
Throught time and care, a bonsai can live for more than a hundred years. The bonsai slowly grows into its perfect form and gives its caregiver a sense of accomplishment and pride. It teaches discipline and focus.
The bonsai represents balance, meditation and harmony. Which makes it a perfect symbol for the enjoyment of the passing time. However, the bonsai requires a lot of time and patience, which could be intimidating for the beginners.

*Tisch der Geduld (table of patience)* is a beginner's kit that simplifies the care for the bonsai, making it accessible to anyone. The daily watering of the plant can be done on the table itself and the turn table facilitates the trimming of the tree. The table itself acts as a pedestal for the miniature tree.

*Made in Halle, Germany*
*2014*

<iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/127985544?color=ffffff&title=0&byline=0&portrait=0" width="700" height="395" frameborder="0" webkitallowfullscreen mozallowfullscreen allowfullscreen></iframe>


[lp=Tisch complete.jpg]


[gfycat=AggravatingNauticalHalicore]


By analysing the workspace of a bonsai professional, we can identify the necessary components for the care of the bonsai : a low table, a turning plate, a tool box and watering equipment.

title: Maestro
body:
Rethinking the space designated for the subway musicians by meeting their needs and promoting interaction with commuters.


*2015*
*Special thank to Ehsan Kia*

[lp=Poster Render.jpg]


<iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/127653503?color=ffffff&title=0&byline=0&portrait=0" width="700" height="394" frameborder="0" webkitallowfullscreen mozallowfullscreen allowfullscreen></iframe>


**&&Functioning&&**
Maestro is a pod for subway musicians to help them stand out and also better interact with commuters.

The information is managed via the website. On this portal, musicians can enter their information which will then be displayed on the pod's screen. On the other hand, travelers can also visit this website to learn more about the musicians and to know their schedules.
[lp=Ecosystem site.jpg]
The musican can access the pod by scanning his card. His information is then displayed on the screen and the seat is unlocked.


[lp=Graphique Maestro Site 3.jpg]


**&&Like button&&**
This feature allows travelers to show their appreciation by simply walking on a decal Like button. The users is thanked on the screen and the counter adds the likes.

The Like button plays the ice breaker between people and the artist. As a result, the commuter has more chance to give a tip or check out the artist on the internet


[lp=Camera site.jpg]


[lp=Graphique Maestro Site 2.jpg]


**&&Easy to install&&**

[lp=Explosee site.jpg]


**&&Brainstorm&&**

[lp=Sketch Site.jpg]


**&&Prototype&&**

[lp=fabrication.jpg]


[lp=Ingrid Like.jpg]

Repenser l’espace alloué aux musiciens de façon à répondre à leurs besoins et de les valoriser aux yeux des usagers du métro.


*Hiver 2015*
*Remerciement spécial à Ehsan Kia*

[lp=Poster Render.jpg]


<iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/127653502?color=ffffff&title=0&byline=0&portrait=0" width="700" height="394" frameborder="0" webkitallowfullscreen mozallowfullscreen allowfullscreen></iframe>


**&&Fonctionnement&&**
Maestro est une borne qui permet de distinguer clairement le musicien et de favoriser l’échange entre lui et les passants de manière ludique.

La gestion de l’information se fait à l’aide du site web. Sur ce portail, les musiciens peuvent entrer leurs informations qui seront ensuite affichées à l’écran de la borne lorsque le musicien se sera identifié. Puis, le public peut également consulter ce site pour s’informer sur les musiciens et pour connaître leurs horaires.


[lp=Graphique Maestro FR 3.jpg]

Le musicien accède à la borne en balayant sa carte membre. Puis, son information s'affiche à l'écran et le siège de débarre.


[lp=Graphique Maestro FR 2.jpg]


**&&Bouton J'aime&&**
Le bouton J’aime permet de montrer son appréciation au musicien sans être obligé de piger dans sa poche. Lorsque quelqu’un marche sur le décalque par terre, la caméra détecte le mouvement, un message de remerciement apparait sur l’écran et le compteur monte.

title: Maestro (fr)
Kids' Sport Store
body:
This flagship store located at Vaughan Mills near Toronto is a first of its kind. This sport store offers exclusively products for kids, from infant to 14 years old.

Thus, all the fixtures have been conceived with the kids in mind. The kid-focused features don't stop at providing fixtures of different sizes, it also offers an interactive experience throughout the shopping process.

*2018*


<iframe width="700" height="394" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Gx7P8iD1XiU?rel=0&showinfo=0" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen></iframe>


**&&Modular Blocks&&**
The block modules allow for a great flexibility across the store. These building blocks can be moved and stacked as desired. Moreover, they can easily be fitted with multiple accessories using an insert system, so that the blocks can adapt to any kind of merchandising without needing to replace the main fixture. For example, these blocks are used as display in the main window presentation, they are used as benches of different heights and also as lead in fixtures, among other things. 

[lp=Sport Chek Kids - Bench.jpg]
[sp=Sport Chek Kids - Footwear 2.jpg][sp=Sport Chek Kids - Lead In.jpg][sp=Sport Chek Kids - Window Display 2.jpg]

[lp=Sport Chek Kids - Interactive Game.jpg]
*Interactive soccer game in the shoe department*


**&&Shoe Table&&**
This interactive shoe table has been conceived with flexibility and efficiency in mind. The smaller segment can be moved and nested inside the larger one and they can store up to 16 shoe boxes. This way, the employee can produce the right shoe size on the spot, without needing trip to th backstore. Some of these table are equipped with a media module capable of scanning display shoes and showing information about features and availability of the product.

[lp=Sport Chek Kids - Shoe Table 2.jpg]


**&&Cash Desk & Tech Wall&&**

[lp=Sport Chek Kids - Cash Desk.jpg]
[lp=Sport Chek Kids - Tech Wall.jpg]

title: Booth
body:
This Booth was developed for a lighting show in New York. It uses transparency and cutout to pique the curiosity to what is inside. Luminaires flow through the structure and are allowed to exceed its limits. The booth is also used as the crate itself.

*2022*

[lp=Booth (3).jpg]


**&&Shipping & Installation&&**

The booth is delivered closed with particle boards screwed in to protect it. In the installation, the structure separates in half diagonally and beams are screwed on top to form a pergola.

title: Drum
body:
Bold, modern, and functional, Drum is a pendant and surface luminaire that provides a generous and wide spread of general lighting. The offset conical baffle adds a unique touch to this cylindrical fixture. Available in combinations of three diameters and three heights, this luminaire offers a wide variety of size and color configurations.
